title: Big Bang
summary: Initialization of the universal ledger; first tick, causal stride c = 1 voxel/tick, routing-pressure relaxation under J(x)=1/2(x+1/x); no physical point singularity.

hero_image.alt: Ledger initialization and expanding voxel horizon
hero_image.caption: From the first tick, differences propagate one voxel per tick forming the causal horizon.
